scripts.deploy:supersim: pnpm deploy:flash-loan-vault:supersim && pnpm deploy:crosschain-flash-loan-token:supersim && pnpm deploy:crosschain-flash-loan-bridge:supersim && pnpm deploy:target-contract:supersim
scripts.deploy:flash-loan-vault:supersim: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains supersiml2a,supersiml2b --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/FlashLoanVault.sol/FlashLoanVault.json --network supersim --private-key 0x5de4111afa1a4b94908f83103eb1f1706367c2e68ca870fc3fb9a804cdab365a
scripts.deploy:flash-loan-vault:interop-alpha: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains interop-alpha-0,interop-alpha-1 --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/FlashLoanVault.sol/FlashLoanVault.json --network interop-alpha --verify
scripts.deploy:crosschain-flash-loan-token:super: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains supersiml2a,supersiml2b --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/CrosschainFlashLoanToken.sol/CrosschainFlashLoanToken.json --network supersim --private-key 0x5de4111afa1a4b94908f83103eb1f1706367c2e68ca870fc3fb9a804cdab365a

scripts.deploy:crosschain-flash-loan-bridge:supe: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains supersiml2a,supersiml2b --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/CrosschainFlashLoanBridge.sol/CrosschainFlashLoanBridge.json --constructor-args 0x820e6303D954E083be1d6051EABC97636A7e468A,0x0884244AbBe2cCfDBFD413EE67E818707dA286e7,10000000000000000,0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266 --network supersim --private-key 0x5de4111afa1a4b94908f83103eb1f1706367c2e68ca870fc3fb9a804cdab365a
scripts.deploy:crosschain-flash-loan-bridge:inte: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains interop-alpha-0,interop-alpha-1 --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/CrosschainFlashLoanBridge.sol/CrosschainFlashLoanBridge.json --constructor-args 0x820e6303D954E083be1d6051EABC97636A7e468A,0x0884244AbBe2cCfDBFD413EE67E818707dA286e7,10000000000000000,0xf39Fd6e51aad88F6F4ce6aB8827279cffFb92266 --network interop-alpha --verify
scripts.deploy:target-contract:supersim: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains supersiml2a,supersiml2b --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/TargetContract.sol/TargetContract.json --network supersim --private-key 0x5de4111afa1a4b94908f83103eb1f1706367c2e68ca870fc3fb9a804cdab365a
scripts.deploy:target-contract:interop-alpha: pnpm build:contracts && sup deploy create2 --chains interop-alpha-0,interop-alpha-1 --salt ethers phoenix --forge-artifact-path contracts/out/TargetContract.sol/TargetContract.json --network interop-alpha --verify
